long_description: The ultralight Leki Carbonlite Trekking Poles feature an innovative design and ergonomic grips to help reduce stress on your joints and provide stability on technical terrain. Positive Angle grips position the hands at an ergonomically correct 15deg angle for comfort. Corrective angle produces a neutral wrist position for optimal swing efficiency and stress relief at wrist joint. Simple and fast to set, Super Lock System quickly locks pole sections in place. Carbon fiber shafts provide solid, ultralight performance. 3-section telescoping poles collapse from 53.2 to 24.8 in. for easy packing. Synthetic tips flex as much as 30deg, reducing the likelihood of damage to pole shaft from hard use; carbide points ensure durability and grip on ice and rock.
short_description: The ultralight Leki Carbonlite Trekking Poles feature an innovative design and ergonomic grips to help reduce stress on your joints and provide stability on technical terrain.
